title: Bike Carrier Towbar - Thule Xpress
description:
Watch this video and learn step by step how to install the Thule Xpress 970 bike rack on the tow bar of your car. 

Thule Xpress 970
The only bike carrier of its kind with an ISO approved towbar coupling.

- Soft, protective frame holders keep the bikes in place.
- Preassembled with strap, and reflectors included for extra safety.
- Bikes are at convenient height from the ground.
- Folds flat for easy storage and handling.
- Use Thule Bike Frame Adapter 981 for fitting of bikes with non-standard frames (e.g. ladies' bikes, BMXs, downhill bikes).

Learn more at www.thule.com
